entry.tran: 慈父般的;像父亲一样的
entry.def: Fatherly feelings or actions are like those of a kind father.

means.word_mean: 1. like or befitting a father or fatherhood; kind and protective
2. showing the affection of a father

sentences.en: He was a fatherly shoulder to cry on when things went wrong.
